Kashira:
Onoemon (斧右衛門)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil (Onnakoroshi abura no jigoku / 女殺油地獄)

The Nine-Tailed Fox (Tamamo no mae asahi no tamoto / 玉藻前曦袂)
